title: fed up with this auto fill
body: so i just picked riven support.  if riots gonna make me support, im just gonna play my champ anyways.  actually worked better than i thought it would in lane, and we might have won if our vi wasnt inting.  "gg riot gave me top 11 games in a row im inting" proceeds to run down mid and give lux 2 kills.  then says "have fun ekko" and goes and feeds the vayne top.
